newsitem.title: USA: National Fuel adds Chevron NJ gas customers.
newsitem.headline: National Fuel adds Chevron NJ gas customers.

text.p: National Fuel Resources Inc said Tuesday it acquired the rights to all of Chevron Corp's New Jersey retail natural gas sales contracts for undisclosed terms.

The company's National Fuel Gas Co subsidiary also said it was reviewing proposed residential pilot programs filed by New Jersey natural gas utilities. Under the programs, residential gas customers can select their natural gas supplier on a competitive basis.
National Fuel said it expected to participate in at least one pilot program in New Jersey.

"The addition of the Chevron customer base to our existing New Jersey operations strengthens our market position as one of the larger retail (natural) gas marketers operating in the state of New Jersey," the company said in a statement.
